comment._content:
99% sure this is on Brighton Pier, UK.   From the terraces and embankment arches in the background, and the style of the wrought-iron railings -

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/livingourdream/146025975/]

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Great find, thanks Beachcomber. Would love to find another image of the diving tower she is using but no luck thus far.
